fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Once, during any phase of the game, you may either queue or force a public message to appear.
- Queuing a public message: This message will be displayed during at the start of the next phase. (Night -> Day)
- Forcing a public message makes it display immediately.
-Target a player; if they due tonight due to any non-bounty hunter role, you gain another use ability above.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Examples of messages:
The glorious sun shines through hypocrisy!
The eternal winter is coming!
The amnesiac has remembered that they were like X!
A deep bell echoes through the town. You don't know where it came from, but you fear what happens if you find out.
